msgs.text: I am Welcome Bot, and I am here to help you get started!
Please complete the following steps as soon as possible:

elements.title: 1. Setup your profile
elements.subtitle: Add profile picture, cover photo, position, department, and manager.

elements.title: 2. Go over your settings
elements.subtitle: Such as general settings, privacy settings, and notifications settings.

elements.title: 3. Join groups you interact with
elements.subtitle: Note: You can see posts without joining.

elements.title: 4. Download mobile apps
elements.subtitle: "Workplace" for notifications and "Work Chat" for communication.
